https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cniQEZvHsnBNaVWMkMG2WnTEASD.jpg In 1918, the poet and boxer Arthur Cravan disappears in the Gulf of Mexico without a trace. Today, another boxer and artist, film director Frank Nicotra, begins an investigation that will take you behind the mysterious steps Cravan from Switzerland to Mexico, passing through Paris, London and Barcelona. Cravan vs. Cravan
